pageContent: Purpose: Patients with large prostate glands are underrepresented in clinical trials incorporating brachytherapy due to concerns for excessive toxicity. We sought to compare health-related quality of life (HRQOL) outcomes between small (<60 cc) and large (≥60 cc) prostates treated with high-dose-rate brachytherapy (HDR-B).

metaData.source:
The association of exercise with both erectile and sexual function in black and white men
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25801073/
